Productivity vs. Social Networks

If you work at a computer for a living you need Rescue Time.

Rescue Time will tell you where you spend those precious hours of each day whether on the web or in a particular application, it will give you a breakdown by Category (Social Media, Work, Photoshop, TextEditor etc.), let’s you tell it which sites you should/shouldn’t be on and ranks you to all users on their system so you can see how productive you are.

</p>

    • *I recently logged in to find that I’m spending WAY too much time on Facebook, you probably are too.</p>
